name: Solar Heat Europe/ESTIF
membership: FAIB: Federation of European and International Associations established in Belgium - faib.org
goal:
Solar Heat Europe/ESTIF is the voice of the solar thermal industry, actively promoting the use of solar thermal technology for renewable heating and cooling in Europe.

Solar Heat Europe/ESTIF coordinates European policy, communications, research and analysis, cooperating with solar thermal key players on a number of market development projects. It provides regular, relevant and up-to-date industry information as well as various services to support membersâ€™ requirements, acting among others as the official Solar Keymark Secretariat.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Energy Labeling, Energy Union, Renewable Energy,
Energy Security, Energy Efficiency, Buildings, Industrial policy, Decarbonisation
